title: MC游戏错误啊啊啊啊
author: ZWZ1230.OK
txt_content:
什么情况啊啊啊啊啊！！！{:10_516:}

   Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game

A full error report has been saved to D:\My Documents\a\oooo\整合包\丧尸乐园客户端FLAN(枪)整合1.5.1\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-06-01_12.52.06-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT ca5aefdf --------
Full report at:
D:\My Documents\a\oooo\整合包\丧尸乐园客户端FLAN(枪)整合1.5.1\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-06-01_12.52.06-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!

Generated 13-6-1 下午12:52

-- System Details --

        Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1

        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Texture Pack: 丧尸乐园专用材质包（由PCO修改）.zip
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)

replies.author: jinrui_w
replies.txt_content: 把材质包删掉试试看，额等等，把允许内存调高点，247mb对MC来说太小了。

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 属性-》设置-》高级-》疑难解答-》把硬件加速跳到3 MC 就可以用啦
